comment.author: 29903115@N06
comment._content: Two of the 'Pearl' class cruisers, possibly a third on the right distance. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pearl_class_cruiser Third ship over is one of the 'Sharpshooter' class torpedo boat destroyers, either 'Boomerang' or 'Karakatta'. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sharpshooter_class_torpedo_gunboat

comment._content: Here we see the Gardens reach of the Brisbane River. Opposite is Kangaroo Point.
